org.vanilladb.core.storage.index

Class Index

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanilladb.core.storage.index.Index
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BTreeIndex, HashIndex

    public abstract class Index
extends Object
    An abstract index that defines the index traversal interface and provides type-agnostic methods.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String dataFileName 
      protected IndexInfo ii 
      protected SearchKeyType keyType 
      protected Transaction tx 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Index(IndexInfo ii, SearchKeyType keyType, Transaction tx)
      Opens a hash index for the specified index.

      Preload the index blocks to memory.
      static long searchCost(IndexType idxType, SearchKeyType keyType, long totRecs, long matchRecs)
      Estimates the number of block accesses required to find all index records matching a search range, given the specified numbers of total records and matching records.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Index

        public Index(IndexInfo ii,
             SearchKeyType keyType,
             Transaction tx)
        Opens a hash index for the specified index.
        Parameters:
        ii - the information of this index
        keyType - the type of the search key
        tx - the calling transaction

    • Method Detail

      • searchCost

        public static long searchCost(IndexType idxType,
                              SearchKeyType keyType,
                              long totRecs,
                              long matchRecs)
        Estimates the number of block accesses required to find all index records matching a search range, given the specified numbers of total records and matching records.

        This number does not include the block accesses required to retrieve data records.

        Parameters:
        idxType - the index type
        keyType - the type of the search key
        totRecs - the total number of records in the table
        matchRecs - the number of matching records
        Returns:
        the estimated the number of block accesses

      • newInstance

        public static Index newInstance(IndexInfo ii,
                                SearchKeyType keyType,
                                Transaction tx)

      • beforeFirst

        public abstract void beforeFirst(SearchRange searchRange)
        Positions the index before the first index record matching the specified range of search keys.
        Parameters:
        searchRange - the range of search keys

      • next

        public abstract boolean next()
        Moves the index to the next record matching the search range specified in the beforeFirst(org.vanilladb.core.storage.index.SearchRange) method. Returns false if there are no more such index records.
        Returns:
        false if no other index records for the search range.

      • getDataRecordId

        public abstract RecordId getDataRecordId()
        Returns the data record ID stored in the current index record.
        Returns:
        the data record ID stored in the current index record.

      • insert

        public abstract void insert(SearchKey key,
                            RecordId dataRecordId,
                            boolean doLogicalLogging)
        Inserts an index record having the specified key and data record ID.
        Parameters:
        key - the key in the new index record.
        dataRecordId - the data record ID in the new index record.
        doLogicalLogging - is logical logging enabled

      • delete

        public abstract void delete(SearchKey key,
                            RecordId dataRecordId,
                            boolean doLogicalLogging)
        Deletes the index record having the specified key and data record ID.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the deleted index record
        dataRecordId - the data record ID of the deleted index record
        doLogicalLogging - is logical logging enabled

      • close

        public abstract void close()
        Closes the index.

      • preLoadToMemory

        Preload the index blocks to memory.
